definition: to build/to construct/to ram/to hit/Taiwan pr. [zhu2]

sentences.english: The wall was built by stamping earth between board frames.
sentences.chinese: 這面土牆是夯土版築而成。

sentences.english: The place where typography was probably invented in our country was the Huanghe river region.
sentences.chinese: 我國發明版築技術的地區應該是黃河流域。
